7. Dodatkowe obowiązki
Wysokość raty pozostaje niezmienna do końca pierwszego okresu obrachunkowego, liczonego od dnia otwarcia rachunku kredytowego do ostatniego dnia miesięcznego okresu obrachunkowego. Wysokość rat ulegnie zmianie w kolejnych miesięcznych okresach obrachunkowych w przypadku, gdy nastąpi zmiana stopy procentowej.
Państwa dochody mogą się zmienić. Prosimy upewnić się, że w sytuacji gdy Państwa dochody zmniejszą się, będą Państwo nadal w stanie spłacać raty kredytu hipotecznego co miesiąc.

In the equal installment system, the amount of the capital and interest installments is identical, while the share of capital and interest in the installment is different. As the credit period expires, the share of capital increases and the interest decreases.
In addition, the Bank points out that the amount of the capital and interest installment may change due to the change in WIBOR 1M.
4
A simulation presenting the amount of each equal installment over the entire credit period has been included in the information "Housing loan - basic conditions and simulations".
. .
7. Additional obligations
The amount of the installment remains unchanged until the end of the first accounting period, counted from the day the credit account is opened to the last day of the monthly accounting period. The amount of the installments will change in subsequent monthly accounting periods if the interest rate changes.
Your income may change. Please make sure that if your income decreases, you will still be able to repay the mortgage installments every month.
